items.sentence: What time did Tom tell you he\'d be arriving?
What time do you think you\'ll get to Boston?
What time do you think you\'ll likely arrive?
This kind of thing has never happened before.
This question is closely related to that one.
Tom and Mary hoped that no one had seen them.
Tom and Mary opened their Christmas presents.
Tom ate in the classroom with his classmates.
I can watch TV all day without getting bored.
Don\'t bother me with such foolish questions.
Don\'t ever run away from me like that again.
Don\'t feel embarrassed. These things happen.
Don\'t forget smoking is bad for your health.
Don\'t forget that you need to do that today.
Don\'t forget to pick me up tomorrow morning.
Tom didn\'t want to answer Mary\'s questions.
Tom and Mary continued looking at each other.
Tom and Mary continued to look at each other.
Tom and Mary quietly slipped out of the room.
Tom and his uncle walked together in silence.
